disease: Squamous cell carcinoma of skin of unspecified parts of face

symptoms.name: Non-healing sore or scab
symptoms.pattern: Persistent for about two months or longer

risk_factors: Excessive ultraviolet (UV) radiation exposure (sunlight, tanning beds)

required: Clinical presentation consistent with squamous cell carcinoma (non-healing sore, scaly patch)
supportive: Biopsy confirming presence of squamous cells with malignant changes
